column6: America...meet your newest Hero! The lethal alien symbiote known as Venom is in the custody of the U.S. military...and with a familiar face from Spider-Man's world inside the suit, the government's own personal Spidey is going into action as one of the nation's top covert agents in hostile territory!
column8: | penciller:Tony Moore | penciller (cover):Joe Quesada | writer:Rick Remender | editor:Stephen Wacker
